transcript:
Customer: Hello
Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ji sir kya Aditya Karke se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Haan, madam bataiye na.
Executive: Ji main Shashi bol rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji ye aapke service ke bare mein baat karni thi, madam ji ko inform kar rahe the email change karne ke liye, aapke email mein aa raha hai.
Customer: Ye isme abhi bhi mail nahi aa raha hai kya? Abhi to maine delete bahut sara mail kiya.
Executive: Aapne delete kiya hai, fir bhi isme dikha raha hai ki abhi wo remove nahi hai.
Customer: Achcha abhi bhi hua nahi hai?
Executive: Nahi sir.
Customer: Ye mere mail mein aisa kuch ab dikh hi nahi raha, humko lag raha hai do chaar hi mail hai abhi jo important mail hai usi ko rakh ke rakhe hue hai, baki to sab delete mare hue hai.
Executive: Baki sab aapne delete kar diya, aapko IndiaMART ki taraf se koi mail gaya aa gaya kal ke date mein?
Customer: Ek minute rukiye, mail to maine abhi check nahi kiya, kal busy tha jyada.
Executive: Ek tarikh ko bhi ek aapke paas inquiry haan aaya to hai kal madam aaya to hai.
Customer: Aaya hai, receive ho raha hai aapko?
Customer: Ek minute isko kholne to dijiye pehle.


Customer: Aa to raha hai, mail to aa raha hai, ek ek do, do mail aaya hai mujhe.
Executive: Theek hai, nahi actually mein aapko dikha raha tha to main pichli baar confirm kar rahi hu aap se ki aapne delete kiya hai to aapko message receive ho raha hai ki nahi.
Customer: Wo steel star fix car body cover aa to raha hai Ranchi se kal, kal ka bhi to aaya mail.
Customer: Kal do mail aaya hai mujhe lekin main mail se jyada nahi dekh kar main to sidhe direct app pe dekhta hu na.
Executive: App pe?
Customer: Site pe jaake, haan app pe hi jaake site pe hi dekhta hu.
Executive: Theek hai, actually mein aapka mail ka storage khada jata hai to hamare paas aa jata hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi aaya hai, aaya hai mail aaya hai kal ka do do mail hai.
Executive: Theek hai. Sir ye buyleads vgera aa rahi hai proper aapko?
Customer: Haan abhi to aa raha hai aisa nahi hai, proper aa raha hai abhi bhi to dikh raha hai abhi aaya hua, abhi to main free hoke fir inko call karunga.
Executive: Ji ji bilkul bilkul aap unko call karke rakhiyega. Ek ek jan se deal hua hai madam ek jan se ho gaya hai.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai sir wo achchi baat hai sir ye hai ki sir daily basis pe buyleads ko consume kiya kariye kyuki na aapki side se ek din do din hota hai fir matlab hota hai ki teen char din ka gap ho jata hai beech mein.
Customer: Hmm hmm thoda time nahi mil pata jiske chalte wo ho jata hai.
Customer: Abhi mere ladke log do hai chutti pe abhi main akele thoda sa tha isliye gap ho raha tha aaj ladke log aa jayenge to main free hoke fir sabhi ko call kar lunga.
Executive: Ji ji ji ji koi baat nahi aap jab bhi free hoiye na aap isko call de dijiyega aur baki sir aapko jo calls aati hai buyers ki IndiaMART buyer ke naam se wo number aapne save kiya hai apne phone mein?
Customer: Wo ek to number to save hai.
Executive: Haan ek IndiaMART buyer ke naam se save karwaya gaya hoga aapko number.
Customer: Haan haan haan haan.
Executive: Theek hai na aapke paas buyers ki call miss ho rahi thi jo yahan se forward ki ja rahi hai. Aisa ki ek tarikh mein aapko na call forward ki ja rahi hai jisme se chhe call miss ho gayi hai.
Customer: Haan ho sakta hai hoga us samay kuch kahin honge ya iske chalte wo call receive nahi kar paye honge.
Executive: Ji ji ho sakta hai busy schedule ki vajah se aap nahi dekh paye honge to aap us number ki bhi details nikal ke call back kar sakte hai, baat kar sakte hai unse.
Customer: Theek hai na madam. Baat baki service mein koi issue to nahi aa raha buyleads vgera mein?
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi koi issue nahi hai.
Executive: Aa rahe hai proper?
Customer: Nahi aisa kuch nahi hai. Haan proper abhi to aa hi raha hai, bas main thoda sa idhar udhar call nahi kar raha tha bas ab aaj call karunga jitna bhi hai.
Executive: Achcha achcha nahi aap call kar lijiyega baki na sab koshish kariye ki daily basis pe buyleads ko consume kare kyuki usse ye hota hai na ki aapke ek wo bhi increase hoti hai.
Executive: Ab to wo ek hota hai ki top pe bana rehta hai fir agar aap kam karte jaoge to wo hota hai ki thoda thoda sa down hota jata hai fall ho jata hai.
Customer: Oh ho aisa aisa ho sakta hai. Main per day matlab theek hai theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Haan aur right platform hai na sir isliye daily basis pe aapko apna maintain karna karna hoga aur fir apna activation dikhana hoga ki buyers ko bhi aap aise jyada connected ho.
Customer: Theek hai na madam, theek theek theek.
Executive: Ji sir aur kuch nahi hai phone kariye.
Customer: Ji madam.
Customer: Okay madam, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer was not receiving emails properly.

- Missed calls from buyers.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed customer is receiving emails.

- Advised to check details and call back missed calls.

- Advised to consume buyleads on daily basis.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, email, missed calls, subscription
